About Me

Professional Technical Writer and Programmer with 12+ years of experience. Wrote various user guides, reference guides, API guides, and other kinds of software and hardware-related documents for Telecom, Electronic Design Automation (EDA), and SDKs-based projects. Used my automation skills to increase the team’s efficiency and automate repetitive manual tasks. Created new strategies to make documentation relevant to the agile-based software development cycle. Advocated for new ways to improve efficiency in product quality. Managed multiple projects by collaborating with local and remote teams.

  • 12+ years of experience in Telecom, Electronic Design Automation (EDA), and Cross-Platform Video Apps domain
  • Detail-oriented, motivated, adaptable, collaborative, initiative-taker, user advocate, and avid learner
  • Automated various tedious and manual tasks using Python to optimize manual workflows
  • Conducted a workshop on the Automate to Innovate topic in STC India Annual Conference 2015, Pune

Skills
